title: Pittsburgh synagogue shooting
summary: The Pittsburgh synagogue shooting was a white supremacist terrorist mass shooting that took place on October 27, 2018, at the Tree of Life – Or L'Simcha Congregation[lower-alpha 1] in the Squirrel Hill neighborhood of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The congregation, along with New Light Congregation and Congregation Dor Hadash, which also worshipped in the building, was attacked during Shabbat morning services. The suspect killed eleven people and wounded six, including several Holocaust survivors.  It was the deadliest attack on the Jewish community in the United States.[5][6]
